name: Coder
0:
”Alexa open coder assistant”
”Alexa ask coder assistant to show me how to write If statement in Java.”
”Alexa ask coder assistant for a code snippet of For in JavaScript.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coder assistant
des:
Coder assistant will teach and show you example how to program and write code in any language. Coder support more then 10 languages (some of them still in progress). You can ask for examples and how to write code and explanation in most popular languages.

for example you can say: 
"Alexa ask coder assistant to show me how to write If statement in Java." 
"Alexa ask coder assistant to show me example of While in Python." 
"Alexa ask coder assistant for a code snippet of For in JavaScript."

*You can select another method while in the specific language screen by saying: 
"Alexa select For statement" 
"Alexa choose If method"
"Alexa show me how to write Break"
